package.name: com.nokia.QtDev-i686-w64-Npackd-Release
package.title: Qt for MinGW-w64 32 bit release mode for Npackd
package.description:
C++ library (development). This library will be used to build Npackd itself.
The installation will create a symbolic link to the directory in C:\NpackdSymlinks. This symbolic link should be used instead of the installation directory instead as a Qt build cannot be easily moved to another directory.
Please note that you have to define an appropriate toolchain in Qt Creator first before defining a new Qt build there. Otherwise adding a new Qt in the configuration dialog would just not work without any error message (Qt Creator 2.6.1)
Please see https://code.google.com/p/windows-package-manager/source/browse/?repo=npackd-scripts for a complete build script.

package.name: com.nokia.QtDev-x86_64-w64-Npackd-Release
package.title: Qt for MinGW-w64 64 bit release mode for Npackd
package.description:
C++ library (development). This library will be used to build Npackd itself.
The installation will create a symbolic link to the directory in C:\NpackdSymlinks. This symbolic link should be used instead of the installation directory instead as a Qt build cannot be easily moved to another directory.
Please note that you have to define an appropriate toolchain in Qt Creator first before defining a new Qt build there. Otherwise adding a new Qt in the configuration dialog would just not work without any error message (Qt Creator 2.6.1)
Please see https://code.google.com/p/windows-package-manager/source/browse/?repo=npackd-scripts for a complete build script.

package.name: log4net
package.title: Log4Net
package.description: The Apache log4net library is a tool to help the programmer output log statements to a variety of output targets. log4net is a port of the excellent Apache log4j™ framework to the Microsoft® .NET runtime. We have kept the framework similar in spirit to the original log4j while taking advantage of new features in the .NET runtime

package.name: net.sourceforge.quazip.QuaZIPSource
package.title: QuaZIP source
package.description: Qt based library to access ZIP archives (source code)

package.name: npackd-dev-i686-w64
package.title: Npackd dev i686 w64
package.description: Npackd source code, scripts to build it and object files for i686/MinGW-w64. The version of this package corresponds to the Npackd version that should be built.

package.name: npackd-dev-x86_64-w64
package.title: Npackd dev x86_64 w64
package.description: Npackd source code, scripts to build it and object files for x86_64/MinGW-w64. The version of this package corresponds to the Npackd version that should be built.

package.name: org.boost.Boost
package.title: Boost
package.description: set of C++ general purpose libraries (source code)

package.name: org.xapian.XapianCore
package.title: Xapian core
package.description: search engine library in C++ (source code)

package.name: quazip-dev-i686-w64-static
package.title: QuaZIP dev i686 w64 static
package.description: QuaZIP for i686 MinGW-w64, statically compiled

package.name: quazip-dev-x86_64-w64-static
package.title: QuaZIP dev x86_64 w64 static
package.description:
QuaZIP for x86_64 MinGW-w64, statically compiled.
Please see https://code.google.com/p/windows-package-manager/source/browse/?repo=npackd-scripts#hg%2Fbuild-packages for a complete build script.

version.file:
for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b *.7z') do set setup=%%x "%sevenzipa%\7za.exe" x "%setup%" del "%setup%"
for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b 4.*') do set name=%%x cd "%name%" for /f "delims=" %%a in ('dir /b') do ( move "%%a" .. ) cd .. rmdir "%name%"

for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b *.7z') do set setup=%%x "%sevenzipa%\7za.exe" x "%setup%" > .Npackd\Output.txt && type .Npackd\Output.txt del "%setup%"
for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b qt4.*') do set name=%%x cd "%name%" for /f "delims=" %%a in ('dir /b') do ( move "%%a" .. ) cd .. rmdir "%name%"

for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b *.7z') do set setup=%%x "%sevenzipa%\7za.exe" x "%setup%" > .Npackd\Output.txt && type .Npackd\Output.txt del "%setup%"
for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b qt5.*') do set name=%%x cd "%name%" for /f "delims=" %%a in ('dir /b') do ( move "%%a" .. ) cd .. rmdir "%name%"

for /f %%x in ('dir /b *.7z') do set setup=%%x "%sevenzipa%\7za.exe" x "%setup%" > .Npackd\Output.txt && type .Npackd\Output.txt
mklink /D C:\NpackdSymlinks\com.nokia.QtDev-i686-w64-Npackd-Release-4.8.2 "%CD%"
rmdir C:\NpackdSymlinks\com.nokia.QtDev-i686-w64-Npackd-Release-4.8.2

for /f %%x in ('dir /b *.7z') do set setup=%%x "%sevenzipa%\7za.exe" x "%setup%" > .Npackd\Output.txt && type .Npackd\Output.txt if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%
del "%setup%" if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%
mklink /D C:\NpackdSymlinks\com.nokia.QtDev-i686-w64-Npackd-Release-%NPACKD_PACKAGE_VERSION% "%CD%"
rmdir C:\NpackdSymlinks\com.nokia.QtDev-i686-w64-Npackd-Release-%NPACKD_PACKAGE_VERSION%

for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b *.7z') do set setup=%%x "%sevenzipa%\7za.exe" x "%setup%" del "%setup%"
for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b 4.*') do set name=%%x cd "%name%" for /f "delims=" %%a in ('dir /b') do ( move "%%a" .. ) cd .. rmdir "%name%"

set onecmd="%npackd_cl%\npackdcl.exe" "path" "--package=org.7-zip.SevenZIPA" "--versions=[9.20, 9.20]" for /f "usebackq delims=" %%x in (`%%onecmd%%`) do set sevenzipa=%%x
for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b *.7z') do set setup=%%x "%sevenzipa%\7za.exe" x "%setup%" > .Npackd\Output.txt && type .Npackd\Output.txt del "%setup%"
for /f "delims=" %%x in ('dir /b qt5.*') do set name=%%x cd "%name%" for /f "delims=" %%a in ('dir /b') do ( move "%%a" .. ) cd .. rmdir "%name%"

for /f %%x in ('dir /b *.7z') do set setup=%%x "%sevenzipa%\7za.exe" x "%setup%" > .Npackd\Output.txt && type .Npackd\Output.txt
mklink /D C:\NpackdSymlinks\com.nokia.QtDev-x86_64-w64-Npackd-Release-4.8.2 "%CD%"
rmdir C:\NpackdSymlinks\com.nokia.QtDev-x86_64-w64-Npackd-Release-4.8.2

for /f %%x in ('dir /b *.7z') do set setup=%%x "%sevenzipa%\7za.exe" x "%setup%" > .Npackd\Output.txt && type .Npackd\Output.txt if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%
del "%setup%" if %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%
mklink /D C:\NpackdSymlinks\com.nokia.QtDev-x86_64-w64-Npackd-Release-%NPACKD_PACKAGE_VERSION% "%CD%"
rmdir C:\NpackdSymlinks\com.nokia.QtDev-x86_64-w64-Npackd-Release-%NPACKD_PACKAGE_VERSION%
